allow: Bash(python -c "import json; data = json.load\(open\(''.claude/skills/tikhub-api-helper/openapi.json'', encoding=''utf-8''\)\); print\(''Tags:'', len\(data.get\(''tags'', []\)\)\); print\(''Paths:'', len\(data.get\(''paths'', {}\)\)\); print\(''Info:'', data.get\(''info'', {}\)\)")

Bash(python -c "import json; data = json.load\(open\(''.claude/skills/tikhub-api-helper/openapi.json'', encoding=''utf-8''\)\); tags = data.get\(''tags'', []\); print\(''\\n''.join\([f""{t[''name'']}: {t.get\(''description'', ''''\)[:60]}"" for t in tags[:20]]\)\)")
